title: Newchanka
author: Newchanka
content: A client hired me to write some articles in April. They contacted me on Telegram and paid an advance. Since then, I've not been able to reach them. I've done half of the job and though I need the balance, I'm more concerned about their safety. By the way, they said they're not a member of the forum, but know a moderator here. I've contacted the mod but he doesn't seem to know my client What I have is just his Telegram username. Who has an idea how to find my client? I just need a guide and won't be sharing their details to protect their privacy.

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: As I understand they paid you in advance just part of money, not for whole job? That's not good sitaution. If they contacted you through Telegram and you don't have any other their contacts, I'm afraid that it will be almost impossible to find them. It's possible that something happened for them, but you can't know. No idea what to suggest for you.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: LTU_btc on June 05, 2023, 10:51:12 PMAs I understand they paid you in advance just part of money, not for whole job? That's not good sitaution. The OP have been paid already in advance to start the work but they never have responded the OP back even though they have already paid OP. The employer didn't get or check OP's work yet and OP still didn't finish the work yet too.So, this is something about a concern being a good human, not as an employee. I guess you could keep your work that you made for them, stop continuing the work temporarily, and wait till they respond. You can't do anything other than that even you may knew his/er other social accounts.

Sometimes there are times clients became suddenly busy IRL so I guess you just need for them to respond because if they didn't need your service they will not pay you in half. Just don't submit any of your work unless you get the full payment for it.Also much better to finish the job and wait for them to contact you and submit then ask for the full payment. Since its so bad if you stop it right now and suddenly they came back then you cannot submit anything because you stop it.

And if you have their other. I also advise you to be patient, probably they might think that the work is big and it would take time for you to complete it and also probably they are also doing another project at somewhere. April to June is some how far distance but since they have paid part of the service fee. I believe they will show up. If you can finished the work so that whenever they came back, and pay you the remaining balance then you submit the whole work to them. And that will also create trust among you guys.At first when I saw the topic I was like, what kind of topic is this. And when I enter the inside I understand the whole story.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: There is no other way of contacting them in other messaging app but only through that Telegram account they've used to message you. If they've paid in advance just to get you work out and then the remaining balance when the work is fully done and complete, that's the typical contract that freelancers does and I guess that's the concern rather than the other one. Regardless of that, keep them informed on that account they've used to message you and what's the situation that both of you are experiencing and the terms that you've agreed with. Isn't it that Telegram accounts have number? Do you see their contact number there? and how long you've been waiting for them? I guess that's the only way aside from chatting them on that username so if it's visible on your end their contact phone number and if you want to contact them that is pretty much the way.

comments.body: If you claimed they paid you already, you can track their wallet address through ninjastic.space and do a broad investigation as to know the wallets it has transacted with and do a search here too if that wallet seen or has been recorded here too. you can see them or have clues in that way to reaching out to your clients if there are any traceable details rightly available here for you to take note of.
